component.text: <textformat blockindent='-14'>ACL 3: Host statement conflicts with previous range statement.</textformat>
<textformat blockindent='-14'>ACL 4: Host statement can always be configured before range statements.</textformat>
Host Configured After Range with no Conflict
<textformat blockindent='-14'>ACL 5: Host statement can be configured after range statement if there is no conflict.</textformat>
